document_data.Synopsis: The players stop for the night at a haunted mansion, where the ghost of the [[wizard]] [[Gunter Weiss]] demands they give up one of their own so that he may take their bodies for his own or he shall slay them all. Refusing, the players must find his cursed [[silver]] heart and use it to destroy him before midnight, or else he shall steal their bodies.
